settings.title: Returns & Refunds
settings.text-1:
Vidlogix wants you to be thrilled with your new purchase. However, if you need to return an item, we're here to help.

For any undamaged product, return it with its included accessories and packaging along with the original receipt (or gift receipt) within 30 days. We’ll offer a refund based on the original payment method.
settings.text-2:
REQUEST AN RMA ONLINE

Web Return (WR) numbers are required for all returns. WR numbers are valid for 12 days. Delinquent and unauthorized returns may be returned at the sender's expense.

In 1 business day you’ll hear back from us with your Web Return (WR) number.

Pack your items carefully since they are still your items until we have verified their functionality and physical condition. Please do not deface or treat the item box as the shipping box.

Any electronics containing user profile data must be either factory reset or password unlocked before sending back to Vidlogix for return.

Ensure that there are no other tracking labels attached to your package. Remove or cover any hazardous materials markings if you are shipping a non-hazardous item.

Affix the mailing label squarely onto the address side of the parcel, covering up any previous delivery address and barcode without overlapping any adjacent side.

Choose the return ship method most convenient to you, but we strongly suggest choosing a carrier that will provide you tracking information and insurance. Unfortunately, we cannot be responsible for your return until it is received at our distribution center.
settings.text-4: Vidlogix is pleased to offer a free warranty identical to the provisions and limitations of the manufacturer's warranty for such items, with the exception of the term, which is equal to three (3) years.

settings.title: Shipping & Delivery
settings.text-1:
Vidlogix will cancel all orders whose billing street address doesn't match the credit card's registered address. Canceled orders can't be reinstated. We don't deliver to exporters or PO/UPS boxes. Orders over $500 require a signature. Orders are processed Monday – Friday, 8:00 AM – 4:00 PM, excluding holidays. 90% of UPS Ground packages are delivered in three days or less, but may take up to 6 days depending on the delivery zone.

See Delivery Times for details.
settings.text-2:
Some items on our website are not regularly stocked. Availability on these items may show as Special Order.

In some cases, the manufacturer will ship select items to you directly. You may generally expect these items to arrive at U.S. destinations in 7-10 days, unless specified otherwise. 

If items in your order qualify as a stock exception, we will ask you whether you'd like us to ship your full order when all items are in stock, or if you'd like to split a shipment (at no extra cost). The estimated delivery shown reflects the shipping time once your item reaches our warehouse.

The Restock Date posted on the product detail page is when we reasonably expect to have the product in stock based on anticipated demand, communications from the manufacturer, and other factors. The estimated time of arrival (ETA) date advised is the time required for the order to be delivered to our distribution center. These dates are good faith estimates and subject to delays or changes. You may cancel an order at any time before shipment. 

If we email you a tracking number during the day, the information may not post to the carrier's website until that evening. 

Business days are defined as Monday to Friday, excluding holidays.
settings.text-3:
Large or heavy items, including select TVs, require freight shipping. Available to most physical addresses in the 48 contiguous United States. Additional restrictions may apply, Call 631-372-5004 for more details.

Delivery time is 2-5 business days for most orders. Allow extra time for delivery to remote addresses.

Someone must receive the delivery. The freight carrier will contact you to schedule delivery to your door or the lobby area of your apartment or condo. Someone will need to be available to meet the driver and sign for the package. Freight deliveries are scheduled for Monday through Friday between 9 AM and 5 PM.

What to expect from the delivery driver. This is a large, heavy item, so arrange to have someone else there to help you unpack and install your equipment. The delivery driver will not help you unpack or set up your new equipment, nor will he remove your old equipment or packaging.

White Glove Delivery. Select televisions (TVs) qualify for white glove delivery. "White Glove" is a premium service that includes carrying the product into any accessible room of your home and unboxing it. The delivery includes the removal and disposal of packaging. Installation is not included.

Keep the product packaging. You'll need it if you have to return or move your item.

DAMAGED & MISSING MERCHANDISE MUST BE REPORTED WITHIN 7 DAYS OF RECEIVING YOUR ORDER.

Prior to signing receipt of your shipment, carefully inspect the box or boxes for any damage. If you see damage you must mark the delivery receipt accordingly. It is recommended to take pictures of the outside of the box and the inside of the box. Then unpack the contents to ensure there is no concealed damage or missing items.

E-mail the following documentation to hello@vidlogix.com and we will be happy to work with the freight company to process a damage claim. 

  • Vidlogix order number
  • Freight tracking number
  • Photographs and description of damage
  • Serial Number (S/N)
settings.text-4:
Orders over $500. Since most Vidlogix shipments contain valuable items, we require our carriers to obtain a signature when they deliver a package. The carrier may make subsequent delivery attempts before returning the shipment to Vidlogix. We are unable to change the shipping address once your order has been placed.

UPS My Choice. You may not change the delivery date or address. We do this to protect the receiver against package fraud.

Missed delivery? You can request that your driver leaves your package on the next delivery attempt. Sign the UPS Delivery Notice in the space provided and place it back where the driver originally left the notice.

No delivery notice? The carrier may make subsequent delivery attempts before returning the shipment to Vidlogix.

Returned to sender? Sorry we missed you. We'll issue a full and prompt refund when the shipment returns to Vidlogix.
settings.text-5:
By deselecting UPS Capital® Insurance, our options will be limited in the event of damaged or lost packages.

Vidlogix's liability for damage or loss to each package is limited to a value of $100. Unless a greater value is purchased, the receiver agrees that the released value of each package is no greater than $100, and that Vidlogix shall not be liable for more than $100 for each package. Shipping insurance is nonrefundable.
settings.text-6: Weather, natural disasters and other uncontrollable events can interrupt UPS transportation flow. Shipments delayed due to an uncontrollable event are not eligible for a refund or credit under the UPS money-back guarantee policy.
settings.text-7: Contact our Customer Support team at hello@vidlogix.comand we will coordinate a reorder to ship the correct merchandise at no additional cost to you. We may also provide you with a prepaid return shipping label and request an immediate return of the incorrectly received merchandise. To avoid additional charges the incorrectly received merchandise must be shipped within 7 days of receiving the prepaid return shipping label. All regular return policies still apply. All merchandise must be returned unused and in original packaging in order to avoid being charged.

settings.title: Payments & Pricing
settings.text-1: Vidlogix accepts Visa, Mastercard, Discover, and Shop Pay. Vidlogix will post payment upon shipment or within seven (7) days of order receipt, whichever is shorter. You may cancel an order at any time before shipment at no cost to you. Canceled orders can't be reinstated.
settings.text-2: Vidlogix may, in its sole discretion, refuse or cancel any order and limit order quantity. Vidlogix may also require additional qualifying information prior to accepting or processing any order. Once we receive your Online or Call Center order, we’ll provide you with an email order confirmation. Your receipt of an order confirmation, however, does not signify Vidlogix’s acceptance of your order, nor does it constitute confirmation of our offer to sell; we are simply confirming that we received your order. Vidlogix reserves the right at any time after receiving your order to accept or decline your order for any reason. If Vidlogix cancels an order after you have already been billed, Vidlogix will refund the billed amount.
settings.text-3: Replying to your email order confirmation is the easiest and fastest way to cancel a pending order. Please double-check your shipping address and reach out to our team immediately if it needs to be changed. Once you receive a shipping notification we are unable to update addresses. If your address is missing information or needs verification, our team will attempt to reach you via email once. If we are unable to reach you, your order will be canceled and refunded. If your order has shipped and you no longer want these items, we will attempt to intercept the package. Fees may apply for all types of requests; however, you’ll only be charged if the request is completed. If we cannot intercept the package, you may return it after arriving.
settings.text-4:
Vidlogix reserves the right to change prices for products displayed at/on the Vidlogix Store at any time, and to correct pricing errors that may inadvertently occur.

Vidlogix will match the price shown on any US-based retailer's website for the identical in-stock product (same size, color, year). Learn more
settings.text-5:
Out of Stock - There may be occasions when Vidlogix confirms your order but subsequently learns that it cannot supply the ordered product. In the event we cannot supply a product you ordered, Vidlogix will cancel the order and refund your purchase price in full.

Backorder Date - This is the date we reasonably expect to have this product in stock based on anticipated demand, communications from the manufacturer, and other factors. This is a good faith estimate, not a guarantee. You may cancel an order at any time prior to shipment at no cost to you. Orders are fulfilled on a first-come-first-serve basis.
settings.text-6: Your order contains one or more items from Vidlogix and may be subject to local sales tax, depending on the state to which the item is being shipped. Unless otherwise noted, Vidlogix's items are subject to sales tax in select states following the state's applicable laws. We do not collect sales or use taxes in all states. For states imposing sales or use taxes, your purchase is subject to use tax unless specifically exempt from taxation. Your purchase is not exempt merely because it is made over the Internet or other remote means. Many states require purchasers to file a sales/use tax return at the end of the year reporting all of the taxable purchases that were not taxed and to pay tax on those purchases. You may find details on how to file these returns at the websites of your respective taxing authorities. The sales tax indicated on the checkout form is an estimate. The sales tax ultimately charged to your credit card will be calculated when your credit card charge is authorized and will reflect applicable state and local taxes.
